Message: A letter arrived from my sister.

The dried ink of the typewriter
penned a cruelly brief message.

“I’m alright.
Please don’t worry.”
That was all it said.

Right on schedule,
the fifth of its kind.
A letter arrived for
each witch I killed.

I hadn’t gotten to see her
even once since that day.

But, even so...
This was the single
thread of hope I had left.

It was hope entangled in misery.
But, no matter how
thin a thread it may be...

If that was the only
thing I could cling to,
I had no choice but to
grasp it for dear life.

I took aim as I always did...
and pulled the trigger.

Then, I approached the body...
to ensure the deed was done.

However, a pair of shaking
legs blocked my path.
My eyes met ones
welling with tears.

Trying to shield my target...
was a young girl.
